description: Introduced an explicit factory layer and a typed infrastructure error boundary while preserving strict DI-first principles and zero runtime magic.
decisions: Factories are an optional convenience layer and not part of the adapter contract
Factories may accept callable():Driver for deferred construction
No runtime instanceof validation is performed when static contracts are present
AdapterCreationException defines the infrastructure error boundary
notes: All factory callable contracts are enforced via PHPStan (@phpstan-param)
PHPStan level max passes with zero errors
No environment access or auto-detection was introduced
This phase does not include DTO-based factories or configuration handling
